name: SuperClickerToilet
description:
Welcome to SuperClickerToilet !

It's a wonderful and colorful world, where the goal is gaining monei  with toilet! 

And on the top of that, you WILL be rewarded :D !

Make 2001 monei points and you will see that HE'S not joking at all !

(I made this game in under 4 hours, this was a challenge that HE gived to me !)
